name: Road Rage ( 3D Car Racing Games )
description:
Well you want to go crazy? Do you have steel nerves to jump on the running cars, kick out the driver, take control of the high power cars, and speed down each stretch of highway before time runs out.

Then this game is for YOU.

You need to reach the goal before the time and the only way is by:
* Jumping over the running cars
* Hitting and Banging cars that comes in your way
* Kicking out the drivers from running car
* Taking control of the high speed cars
* Driving your car in wrong direction
* Performing stunts like Long risky Jumps
* Jumping cars without stopping to gain bonus time
* Reverse the speed of car coming in opposite direction
* High speed driving using nitro boost
* And many more life risking acts…


Believe me this is not yet another simple car racing game it has more than we can describe it here.

IT IS MUCH INTERESTING AND ENTERTAINING THAN IT SOUNDS.

Features:
* 17 Themes with highly detailed 3d graphics
* 24 challenging and addictive levels. more coming soon……
* Numerous Stunts to perform
* Cool and high speed cars.
* Vibrant and cool sound effects
* Simple and Smooth Controls
* Unique and Addictive Game play
* Universal App for iPhone and iPad
* Retina Support
